images.mining.codebook

Class GenericCodeBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • images.mining.codebook.GenericCodeBook

  • public class GenericCodeBook
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic class for representing image feature codebooks.

      • getHistogramForImageRepresentation

        public QuantizedImageHistogram getHistogramForImageRepresentation(DataSet rep,
                                                         QuantizedImageHistogramDataSet qihDSet,
                                                         java.lang.String imagePath)
                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates a quantized image representation.
        Parameters:
        rep - DataSet that is the representation of the image to quantize.
        qihDSet - QuantizedImageHistogramDataSet data context to use for initializing the quantized representation.
        imagePath - String that is the path to the image file.
        Returns:
        QuantizedImageHistogram that is the quantized image representation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
